original_text: And ye shall rejoice before the Lord your God, ye, and your sons, and your daughters, and your menservants, and your maidservants, and the Levite that is within your gates; forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you.
korean_text: 너희와 너희의 자녀와 노비와 함께 너희의 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워할 것이요 네 성중에 있는 레위인과도 그리할지니 레위인은 너희 중에 분깃이나 기업이 없음이니라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall rejoice before the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 하나님 여호와 앞에서 즐거워할 것이요

sentences.original_text: ye, and your sons, and your daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 너와 네 아들들과 네 딸들과

sentences.original_text: and your menservants, and your maidservants
and the Levite that is within your gates
forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그에게 너희와 함께 분깃이나 유업이 없음이라
